languages.text: "Что же вы такое говорите? К-как это сервиторы? Да я всю жизнь честно выполнял свои священные обязанности перед Империумом и Администратумом! И печати оберегал — в том числе! Ни одну за полвека не испортил, в отдельном футляре хранил да ежемесячно маслами рукоятки натирал, как того требуют правила!"

traits.locale_text: "Что же вы такое говорите? К-как это сервиторы? Да я всю жизнь честно выполнял свои священные обязанности перед Империумом и Администратумом! И печати оберегал — в том числе! Ни одну за полвека не испортил, в отдельном футляре хранил да ежемесячно маслами рукоятки натирал, как того требуют правила!"

languages.text: "I beg your pardon? W-what's this about servitors? I have faithfully performed my sacred duties to the Imperium and the Administratum all my life! And guarding the seals is part of that! And after half a century, not a single seal damaged! I keep them in a special case and I oil the handles every month, as the rules stipulate!"
languages.original_text: "Что же вы такое говорите? К-как это сервиторы? Да я всю жизнь честно выполнял свои священные обязанности перед Империумом и Администратумом! И печати оберегал — в том числе! Ни одну за полвека не испортил, в отдельном футляре хранил да ежемесячно маслами рукоятки натирал, как того требуют правила!"

traits.locale_text: "I beg your pardon? W-what's this about servitors? I have faithfully performed my sacred duties to the Imperium and the Administratum all my life! And guarding the seals is part of that! And after half a century, not a single seal damaged! I keep them in a special case and I oil the handles every month, as the rules stipulate!"

"I beg your pardon? W-what's this about servitors? I have faithfully performed my sacred duties to the Imperium and the Administratum all my life! And guarding the seals is part of that! And after half a century, not a single seal damaged! I keep them in a special case and I oil the handles every month, as the rules stipulate!"

"I beg your pardon? W-what's this about servitors? I have faithfully performed my sacred duties to the Imperium and the Administratum all my life! And guarding the seals is part of that! And after half a century, not a single seal damaged! I keep them in a special case and I oil the handles every month, as the rules stipulate!"

"I beg your pardon? W-what's this about servitors? I have faithfully performed my sacred duties to the Imperium and the Administratum all my life! And guarding the seals is part of that! And after half a century, not a single seal damaged! I keep them in a special case and I oil the handles every month, as the rules stipulate!"

languages.text: “请问您刚刚是在说什么？怎……怎么突然就提到机仆了？我这辈子都在忠实地履行我对帝国与内政部的神圣职责！看守这些印章只是其中的一部分！半个世纪过去了，这些印章一个都没有损坏！我把所有印章都储藏在特制的箱子里，而且每个月都会按照制度规定，给印章的手柄上油！”
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon? W-what's this about servitors? I have faithfully performed my sacred duties to the Imperium and the Administratum all my life! And guarding the seals is part of that! And after half a century, not a single seal damaged! I keep them in a special case and I oil the handles every month, as the rules stipulate!"

traits.locale_text: “请问您刚刚是在说什么？怎……怎么突然就提到奴工了？我这辈子都在忠实地履行我对帝国与内政部的神圣职责！看守这些印章只是其中的一部分！半个世纪过去了，这些印章一个都没有损坏！我把所有印章都储藏在特制的箱子里，而且每个月都会按照制度规定，给印章的手柄上油！”

languages.text: «¿D-disculpe? ¿Por qué habla de servidores? ¡He cumplido con mis deberes sagrados al Imperium y al Administratum durante toda mi vida! ¡Proteger los sellos es parte de ellos! ¡Y después de medio siglo, no hay ni un sello dañado! ¡Los guardo en un recipiente especial y lubrico sus mangos cada mes, tal y como estipula la normativa!».
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon? W-what's this about servitors? I have faithfully performed my sacred duties to the Imperium and the Administratum all my life! And guarding the seals is part of that! And after half a century, not a single seal damaged! I keep them in a special case and I oil the handles every month, as the rules stipulate!"

traits.locale_text: «¿D-disculpe? ¿Por qué habla de servidores? ¡He cumplido con mis deberes sagrados al Imperium y al Administratum durante toda mi vida! ¡Proteger los sellos es parte de ellos! ¡Y después de medio siglo, no hay ni un sello dañado! ¡Los guardo en un recipiente especial y lubrico sus mangos cada mes, tal y como estipula la normativa!».

languages.text: 「何です？サーヴィターがこれを？私は生涯を通して、帝国と行政局から与えられた聖なる職務を忠実に遂行してきました！封ろうを守ることはその一部！半世紀経っても、封ろうはひとつたりとも傷んでいません！特別なケースで保管し、持ち手には毎月油を差しています！規定どおりに！」
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon? W-what's this about servitors? I have faithfully performed my sacred duties to the Imperium and the Administratum all my life! And guarding the seals is part of that! And after half a century, not a single seal damaged! I keep them in a special case and I oil the handles every month, as the rules stipulate!"

traits.locale_text: 「何です？サーヴィターがこれを？私は生涯を通して、帝国と行政局から与えられた聖なる職務を忠実に遂行してきました！封ろうを守ることはその一部！半世紀経っても、封ろうはひとつたりとも傷んでいません！特別なケースで保管し、持ち手には毎月油を差しています！規定どおりに！」

languages.text: "Wie bitte? W-wieso Servitoren? Ich habe meine heiligen Pflichten gegenüber Imperium und Administratum mein ganzes Leben lang treu erfüllt! Und die Bewachung der Siegel gehört dazu! Und in einem halben Jahrhundert wurde nie auch nur ein Siegel beschädigt! Ich bewahre sie in einem eigenen Kästchen auf und öle jeden Monat die Griffe, genau wie es die Regeln verlangen!"
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon? W-what's this about servitors? I have faithfully performed my sacred duties to the Imperium and the Administratum all my life! And guarding the seals is part of that! And after half a century, not a single seal damaged! I keep them in a special case and I oil the handles every month, as the rules stipulate!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie bitte? W-wieso Servitoren? Ich habe meine heiligen Pflichten gegenüber Imperium und Administratum mein ganzes Leben lang treu erfüllt! Und die Bewachung der Siegel gehört dazu! Und in einem halben Jahrhundert wurde nie auch nur ein Siegel beschädigt! Ich bewahre sie in einem eigenen Kästchen auf und öle jeden Monat die Griffe, genau wie es die Regeln verlangen!"

languages.text: « Je vous demande pardon ? P-pourquoi parlez-vous de servitors ? J'ai consacré toute ma vie à mes devoirs sacrés envers l'Imperium et l'Administratum, dont la garde des sceaux ! Je peux même vous dire qu'au bout d'un demi-siècle, ils sont toujours en parfait état ! Je les conserve dans un boîtier spécial et je graisse les poignées chaque mois, comme le stipulent les règles ! »
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon? W-what's this about servitors? I have faithfully performed my sacred duties to the Imperium and the Administratum all my life! And guarding the seals is part of that! And after half a century, not a single seal damaged! I keep them in a special case and I oil the handles every month, as the rules stipulate!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous demande pardon ? P-pourquoi parlez-vous de servitors ? J'ai consacré toute ma vie à mes devoirs sacrés envers l'Imperium et l'Administratum, dont la garde des sceaux ! Je peux même vous dire qu'au bout d'un demi-siècle, ils sont toujours en parfait état ! Je les conserve dans un boîtier spécial et je graisse les poignées chaque mois, comme le stipulent les règles ! »

languages.text: "Affedersiniz, anlamadım. Ne hizmetörü? İmparatorluk ve Administratum'a olan kutsal vazifelerimi bilfiil sadakatle yerine getirdim! Mühürleri korumak da bu vazifelerin bir parçası! Hem neredeyse bir asırdır mühürlerin teki bile zarar görmedi! Onları özel bir kutuda saklıyor ve saplarını mevzuatta belirtildiği üzere her ay yağlıyorum!"
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon? W-what's this about servitors? I have faithfully performed my sacred duties to the Imperium and the Administratum all my life! And guarding the seals is part of that! And after half a century, not a single seal damaged! I keep them in a special case and I oil the handles every month, as the rules stipulate!"

traits.locale_text: "Affedersiniz, anlamadım. Ne servitörü? İmparatorluk ve Administratum'a olan kutsal vazifelerimi bilfiil sadakatle yerine getirdim! Mühürleri korumak da bu vazifelerin bir parçası! Hem neredeyse bir asırdır mühürlerin teki bile zarar görmedi! Onları özel bir kutuda saklıyor ve saplarını mevzuatta belirtildiği üzere her ay yağlıyorum!"
